analysis.key_quote: This policy undermines the merit-based foundation of our federal workforce. It allows for the reclassification of policy-influencing roles at the discretion of the President—without due process protections or the ability to appeal to the MSPB.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of civil service protections, due process rights, and the potential for politicization of public service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and institutional integrity.
